item.title: Toggle night light in Ubuntu
item.description: Set night light to always on Link to heading Install dconf-editor: sudo apt install dconf-editor Open dconf-editor and navigate to the key/org/gnome/settings-daemon/plugins/color/ Set night-light-schedule-automatic to false Set night-light-schedule-from to 0, and night-light-schedule-to to 24 (or any value higher than this) ref: link Add custom shortcut to toggle night light Link to heading Use the following script: bash -c "if [[ $(gsettings get org.
